short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use JavaScript's built in CSPRNG to generate secure, unique passwords of any length from a selectable list of character sets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate unique and secure passwords that can meet any password requirement. Create a one to one-hundred character long password composed of a customizable selection of letters, numbers, spaces, and special characters. Cryptographically secure passwords are created from JavaScript's built in Crypto.getRandomValues() method.
